item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋努力说服投资者人工智能没有泡沫
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋驳斥了人们对人工智能泡沫的担忧，称公司的最新芯片有望在未来几个季度创造 5 万亿美元的收入。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang dismissed concerns about an artificial intelligence bubble, saying the company’s latest chips are on track to generate half a trillion dollars in revenue during the coming quarters.】

item.title: 国债需求疲软，等待美联储发行七年期国债
item.description: 尽管市场对七年期国债拍卖的需求疲软，但国债收益率仍保持了近几周的大部分升幅，这使得国债收益率达到了今年的最低水平，市场预期美联储将在周三降息。【原文：Treasuries held most of the advance that’s driven yields toward their lowest levels of the year in recent weeks despite weak demand for an auction of seven-year notes, anticipating a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut on Wednesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为美联储将重启2019年政策以缓解市场压力
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The Federal Reserve will take extra steps to address pressures in funding markets, which are likely to persist even after it ends its balance-sheet unwinding, most likely this week, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategists.】

item.title: 谷歌核电交易后，NextEra 计划为爱荷华州提供更多电力
item.description: 就在 NextEra Energy 公司透露将重开爱荷华州的一座核电站，为谷歌数据中心供电的一天后，这家能源开发商表示，目前正计划在该地区增加发电量，以应对人工智能的蓬勃发展。【原文：One day after NextEra Energy Inc. revealed it would reopen a nuclear plant in Iowa to feed Google data centers, the energy developer said it’s now planning for more power generation in the area for the AI boom.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚转向黄金贸易，力求使犯罪分子无法获得黄金
item.description: 哥伦比亚政府计划开始直接向小规模生产商购买黄金，以遏制非法活动，并使因价格飙升而不受监管的采矿业繁荣正规化。【原文：Colombia’s government plans to start purchasing gold directly from small-scale producers in a bid to curb illegal activity and formalize an unregulated mining boom fueled by surging prices.】

item.title: Lucid 与 Nvidia 合作开发面向消费者的无人驾驶技术
item.description: Lucid Group Inc.正与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）合作开发完全自动驾驶汽车平台，力争成为首批制造无需驾驶员监督的乘用车的汽车制造商之一。【原文：Lucid Group Inc. is partnering with Nvidia Corp. to develop a fully autonomous vehicle platform, as it races to become one of the first automakers to build a passenger car that requires no supervision from drivers.】

item.title: 意大利莱昂纳多防务公司将出售部分 Avio 股份
item.description: 欧洲最大的国防和航空航天公司之一莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo SpA）正在通过向机构投资者加速配售的方式出售火箭制造商阿维奥公司（Avio SpA）的少数股权，以帮助该公司为 4 亿欧元（4.67 亿美元）的增资提供资金。【原文：Leonardo SpA, one of Europe’s largest defense and aerospace companies, is selling a minority stake in rocket maker Avio SpA through an accelerated placement to institutional investors to help fund the company’s €400 million ($467 million) capital increase.】

item.title: 停摆如何切断了指导美联储的关键数据
item.description: 在美国经济的关键时刻，美联储官员正准备决定是继续降低利率还是保持利率稳定，但他们必须在有限的新数据面前做出决定。【原文：At a crucial moment for the US economy, Federal Reserve officials are preparing to decide whether to keep lowering interest rates or hold them steady — but they will have to do so with limited fresh data.】

item.title: ASM 第三季度订单不及预期，前景黯淡
item.description: ASM International NV 公布的第三季度订单不及分析师预期，原因是尖端芯片制造商的需求下降，以及来自中国的订单减少。【原文：ASM International NV reported third-quarter orders that missed analysts’ estimates due to lower demand from manufacturers of cutting-edge chips and a drop off in orders from China.】

item.title: 墨西哥石油公司称其套期保值在油价下跌时赚了 1.5 亿美元
item.description: 墨西哥国有石油公司 Pemex 表示，由于上个月原油价格走软，该公司从原油套期保值中获利约 1.5 亿美元。【原文：Mexico’s state-owned oil company Pemex said it made about $150 million from its crude oil hedges as prices softened last month.】

item.title: 特朗普呼吁降低美国牛肉价格，牛期货大跌
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发誓要解决牛肉价格居高不下的问题，牲畜交易商对此十分关注，这使得饲料牛期货价格创下四年来最大跌幅。【原文：Livestock traders are paying attention to President Donald Trump’s vow to tackle high beef prices, sending futures for feeder cattle tumbling the most in four years.】

item.title: 美国北约特使称特朗普将对俄罗斯实施制裁
item.description: 美国驻北约大使表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将继续对俄罗斯实施严厉的新石油制裁，以迫使弗拉基米尔-普京通过谈判结束俄乌战争。【原文：US President Donald Trump will follow through and enforce harsh new oil sanctions on Russia to pressure Vladimir Putin into negotiations to end the Russia-Ukraine war, the US ambassador to NATO said.】

item.title: 7 万亿美元市场中的交易者转而选择隐晦的 CPI 数据
item.description: 7 万亿美元市场中的交易员们正在努力应对前所未有的局面，即在没有任何消费价格数据的情况下，必须对与美国通胀挂钩的证券进行定价。【原文：Traders in a $7 trillion market are grappling with the unprecedented scenario of having to price securities tied to US inflation without any consumer price data.】

item.title: 金融科技公司正逐步接近银行业的大额支付特权
item.description: 美联储正在权衡是否重新划定美国金融体系的边界，这是一个可能影响深远的转变。美联储正在考虑的一项提案将允许金融科技巨头，如 Circle Internet Group Inc.和 Stripe Inc.【原文：In a potentially far-reaching shift, the Federal Reserve is weighing whether to redraw the perimeter of the US financial system. A proposal under consideration would grant fintech giants like Circle Internet Group Inc. and Stripe Inc. a form of direct access to the central bank’s core payment infrastructure — a privilege historically reserved for banks.】

item.title: 优步希望从 2027 年起拥有 10 万辆基于英伟达™（NVIDIA®）处理器的机器人车队
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）将从 2027 年开始扩大由 10 万辆采用英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）技术的自动驾驶汽车组成的车队，这一雄心勃勃的举措有助于降低向消费者提供可叫车机器人出租车的成本。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. will begin expanding a fleet of 100,000 autonomous vehicles powered by Nvidia Corp. technology starting in 2027, an ambitious move that could help bring down the cost of offering hailable robotaxis to consumers.】

item.title: 英伟达发布将量子计算机与其人工智能芯片相连接的系统
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）发布了一个将量子计算机与该公司人工智能芯片连接起来的新系统，抓住了这一新兴技术的机遇，该技术有望大幅提高处理速度，推动医学和材料科学的进步。【原文：Nvidia Corp. unveiled a new system to connect quantum computers with the company’s artificial intelligence chips, seizing on an emerging technology that holds the promise of significantly faster processing to drive advances in medicine and materials science.】

item.title: 白金公司面临出售中心球场成败债务的斗争
item.description: Centerfield Media 的债权人正在组织起来，要求在再融资交易中获得更好的条款；这可能会决定该公司是否会面临白金资产公司（Platinum Equity）旗下企业接连违约的风险。【原文：Creditors for Centerfield Media are organizing to demand better terms on a refinancing deal — one that could determine whether or not the company risks adding to a spate of defaults from Platinum Equity-owned businesses.】

item.title: 沙特人工智能主管誓言在竞购美国芯片时不使用华为技术
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯人工智能初创公司 Humain 的负责人塔里克-阿明（Tareq Amin）说，在他的公司向美国官员提供了详细的保证之后，他相信美国会批准向沙特阿拉伯王国出售先进的芯片。【原文：Tareq Amin, the head of Saudi Arabia’s artificial intelligence startup Humain, said he is confident the US will clear the sale of advanced chips to the kingdom after his firm provided detailed guarantees to American officials.】

item.title: 奥地利破产案可能出售 410 磅重金方的股份
item.description: 奥地利破产投资者克莱门斯-哈尔曼（Klemens Hallmann）的管理人正准备出售 186 公斤（410 磅）金立方体的股份。【原文：A stake in a 186-kilogram (410 pound) gold cube is being prepared to be sold by the administrators of insolvent Austrian investor Klemens Hallmann.】

item.title: Polymarket 计划数周内重返美国，专注于体育运动
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，预测市场 Polymarket 正准备在未来几周重返美国，重点关注体育博彩。【原文：Prediction market Polymarket is preparing to return to the US in the coming weeks with a focus on sports betting, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 梅利莎登陆，成为袭击牙买加的首个五级风暴
item.description: 飓风梅利莎成为袭击牙买加的第一个有记录的 5 级风暴，是大西洋有史以来威力最大的登陆飓风之一。【原文：Hurricane Melissa became the first recorded Category 5 storm to strike Jamaica, coming ashore as one of the most powerful landfalls ever observed in the Atlantic.】

item.title: 制裁和炼油厂停工双重打击下柴油价格飙升
item.description: 由于对俄罗斯的新制裁和炼油厂停工威胁到供应，欧洲柴油市场正在飙升。【原文：Europe’s diesel market is soaring as a combination of new sanctions on Russia and refinery outages threaten supplies.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官准备公布与三星和现代汽车的人工智能协议
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）老板黄仁勋计划在本周访问韩国时，公布向三星电子公司和现代汽车集团等韩国大公司供应人工智能芯片的新合同，为其业务开拓新机遇。【原文：Nvidia Corp. boss Jensen Huang plans to unveil new contracts to supply AI chips to major South Korean companies, including Samsung Electronics Co. and Hyundai Motor Group, when he visits the country this week to carve out new opportunities for his business.】

item.title: Brightline 赢得 9.85 亿美元通勤债券谈判延期
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，周二，在债券持有人允许该公司延长相关交易谈判的最后期限后，在迈阿密和奥兰多之间运营 235 英里私营铁路的 Brightline 公司将不会被迫回购 9.85 亿美元的市政债务。【原文：Brightline, which runs a 235-mile private railroad between Miami and Orlando, won’t be forced to buy back $985 million of municipal debt Tuesday after bondholders granted the company a deadline extension on related deal talks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克总理称赞中国电动汽车电池厂与欧盟决裂
item.description: 斯洛伐克总理罗伯特-菲佐（Robert Fico）对中国国轩高科有限公司（Gotion High-Tech Co.【原文：Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico hailed a decision by China’s Gotion High-Tech Co. to build a €1.2 billion ($1.4 billion) electric-car battery plant in his country even as ties between Beijing and the European Union grow increasingly tense.】

item.title: 瑞士保险公司 Youplus 停止新业务，寻求新资本
item.description: Youplus 集团正在寻求新的支持者，因为衡量其财务实力的一个关键指标骤降到了自我设定的目标以下。【原文：Youplus Group is seeking new backers after one of its key measures of financial strength plunged below a self-imposed target.】

item.title: 预计加拿大央行将在卡尼发表预算案前降息
item.description: 在加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）敲定刺激经济增长的预算计划之际，加拿大央行很可能会降息，以帮助因美国关税而遭受更多损失的经济。【原文：The Bank of Canada is likely to cut interest rates to help an economy that’s suffering more damage from US tariffs, even as Prime Minister Mark Carney finalizes plans for a stimulative budget to boost growth.】

item.title: 阿波罗的克莱因曼预计 PE 交易将继续放缓步伐
item.description: 美联储的降息预期为期待已久的交易卷土重来带来了希望，但阿波罗全球管理公司的斯科特-克莱因曼（Scott Kleinman）预计，未来几年私募股权公司出售资产的速度将继续放缓。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s expected rate cuts are fueling hopes of a long-awaited deal comeback, but Apollo Global Management Inc.’s Scott Kleinman anticipates that private equity firms will keep selling their assets at a slower pace for the next few years.】

item.title: 波士顿私立大学信用评级被穆迪降至垃圾级
item.description: 波士顿的一所私立大学采取了一项不同寻常的策略，试图扭转财务紧张的局面：削减本科生人数。【原文：A private university in Boston has taken an unusual strategy in an attempt to right its stressed finances: cutting the number of undergraduate students.】

item.title: SoFi 首席执行官称超越借贷助推本季度业绩创纪录
item.description: SoFi Technologies Inc.首席执行官安东尼-诺托（Anthony Noto）表示，SoFi Technologies Inc.在贷款以外的客户服务领域的扩张正在盈利中显现，帮助推动第三季度业绩创下新高。【原文：SoFi Technologies Inc. is seeing its expansion in customer services beyond lending showing up in earnings, helping drive record results in the third quarter, Chief Executive Officer Anthony Noto said.】
